info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 1:50PM MDT until March 18 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Socorro County in central New Mexico... Southern Valencia County in central New Mexico...
* Until 445 PM MDT.
* At 150 PM MDT, an area of blowing dust was located over an area from Belen southward to Socorro.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility.
SOURCE...Satellite observations.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Locations impacted include... Socorro, Belen, Magdalena, La Joya, San Acacia, Bernardo, Lemitar, Escondida, Veguita and Casa Colorada.
This includes the following highways... Highway 380 between Mile Markers 1 and 3. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 111 and 191. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 127 and 196.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 4:45 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 4:45 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 1:50PM MDT until March 18 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:45 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 4:45 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
